attributes.action: Extend SDLT for applicants that have already begun their mortgage process.
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government/Parliament to do this because it unfair for people who have already got their mortgage agreed but cannot make the stamp duty holiday by 30 June because of solicitors demands/cases so high with so many mortgages to process.
attributes.background: People who have mortgage agreement now should benefit from the SDLT (nil rate £500'000) but due to solicitors being in high demand they are not able to complete the process in time. Therefore an extension should be granted for applicants already in process of buying.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Properties that have had an offer excepted will have the STLD holiday honoured: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563565

Stamp duty holiday to be triggered upon exchange of contracts: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581308

Extend Stamp Duty Holiday for people that have had an offer accepted: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584239
